inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed intracranial Grade 3 or 4 anaplastic glioma or glioblastoma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma.

inclusion.criterion: Received prior standard radiation for a Grade 3 or 4 astrocytic tumor with a minimum cumulative dose of 40 Gy administered
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Completed at least one full cycle of temozolomide of 200 mg/m2/day administered on Days 1-5 of a 28-day cycle, without unacceptable toxicity or progression
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Therapy included field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide 7 days on and 7 days off.

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status of 60 or more
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ and bone marrow function as defined by hematological and serum chemistry limits
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Both men and women must practice adequate contraception
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Therapy included field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide 7 days on and 7 days off.

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of acute intracranial or intratumoral hemorrhage > Grade 1
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Restriction of some therapies/medications within specific timeframes prior to enrollment and during the study including cytotoxic chemotherapy other than temozolomide, biologic agents, nitrosoureas or mitomycin C, small-molecule kinase inhibitors, non-cytotoxic hormonal agents, prior therapy with a PI3K inhibitors, radiation therapy, enzyme-inducing anti-convulsants, valproic acid
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Not recovered from the toxic effects of prior therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Unknowns include adequate organ and bone marrow function, contraception status, and recovery from prior therapy.
